name: Aspirin
description: Aspirin is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to treat pain, fever, and inflammation. It also has antiplatelet properties.

dosage_forms.usage_instructions: Take one tablet every 4 to 6 hours as needed with food or a full glass of water.
Chew or crush the tablet and swallow with or without water.

name: Ibuprofen
description: Ibuprofen is an NSAID used to relieve pain, reduce inflammation, and lower fever.

dosage_forms.usage_instructions: Take one tablet every 4 to 6 hours as needed with food or milk.
Shake well before use. Measure the liquid using the provided dosing cup.

name: Paracetamol
description: Paracetamol, also known as acetaminophen, is a medication used to treat pain and fever. It is commonly used for mild to moderate pain and can reduce fever.

dosage_forms.usage_instructions: Take one to two tablets every 4 to 6 hours as needed with a full glass of water.
Shake well before use. Measure the liquid using the provided dosing spoon.

name: Loratadine
description: Loratadine is an antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms such as runny nose, sneezing, itchy or watery eyes, and itching of the throat or nose.

dosage_forms.usage_instructions: Take one tablet daily with or without food.
Shake well before use. Measure the syrup using the provided dosing spoon.

name: Ciprofloxacin
description: Ciprofloxacin is an antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections. It works by stopping the growth of bacteria.

dosage_forms.usage_instructions: Take one tablet twice daily, at least 2 hours before or 6 hours after antacids or dairy products.
Shake well before use. Measure the suspension using the provided dosing cup.

name: Omeprazole
description: Omeprazole is a proton pump inhibitor (PPI) used to reduce stomach acid production. It is used to treat conditions such as heartburn, gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), and stomach ulcers.

dosage_forms.usage_instructions: Take one capsule daily before a meal.
Shake well before use. Measure the suspension using the provided dosing syringe.

name: Amoxicillin
description: Amoxicillin is an antibiotic used to treat a wide range of bacterial infections. It is a penicillin-type antibiotic.

dosage_forms.usage_instructions: Take one capsule three times daily with or without food.
Shake well before use. Measure the suspension using the provided dosing syringe.

name: Alprazolam
description: Alprazolam, commonly known as Xanax, is a medication used to treat anxiety and panic disorders. It belongs to the benzodiazepine class of drugs.

dosage_forms.usage_instructions: Take one tablet two to three times daily as needed.
